text:
Dear whatever you were
I am letting you go

It's been eating me up for some time
You may notice a change
But please don't change anything, 'Cause I feel we're just better off moving on with our lives

It's not that you did something wrong
It's just we've been doing stance here for way too long

And it's not that I found someone new
I just finally found the part of me I thought I left in you
I thought I left in you
I thought I left in you

I still think about us but not by building you up
'Cause I know you could have treated me better

Yeah, I hope you're not being a d*** anymore
To whoever you're with

But I truly wish you the best (I wish you the best)
And that's not me still being all bitter
It's not that you (it's not that you) did something wrong (did something wrong)

It's just we've been doing stance here for way too long
And it's not that I (it's not that I) found someone new
I just finally found the part of me I thought I left in you
I thought I left in you
I thought I left in you

Dear whatever you were
I am letting you go
